# f5distributedcloud_service_policy_set (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_service_policy_set` resource manages Service Policy Sets in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Service Policy Sets group service policies together for organization and management purposes.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_service_policy_set" "example" {
  name        = "my-policy-set"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Example service policy set"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the service policy set.
- `namespace` (String) The namespace where the service policy set will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the service policy set.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the service policy set.
